description:
Bo is a 20-year-old college student. There are three things that I learned about Bo:
1. He's extremely polite;
2. He's very calm and soft spoken; and
3. He's very accommodating.
He had never stuck anything up his ass before and when asked he was quick to say "yes".
All it took was a little bit of lube and his finger began exploring. Bo is pretty smooth up top, but he's got a nice hairy ass crack and his hole seemed to enjoy the attention.
"It was quite an experience," he said afterward.
I like to tease the guys sometimes. The flirting helps break the ice.
"You've got nice full lips," I told him. "Anyone ever tell you that?"
"Yeah, my ex," he said. "She liked the way they felt."
title: Bo
